text: The 2007–08 Richmond Spiders men's basketball team represented the University of Richmond in National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I college basketball during the 2008–09 season. Richmond competed as a member of the Atlantic 10 Conference (A-10) under third-year head basketball coach Chris Mooney and played its home games at the Robins Center. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9| Regular Season |- !colspan=9| 2008 Atlantic 10 Men's Basketball Tournament |- !colspan=9| 2008 College Basketball Invitational ==References== Category:Richmond Spiders men's basketball seasons Richmond Richmond Richmond Richmond
title: 2007–08 Richmond Spiders men's basketball team
